amendment.description: Amendment prohibits any funds to be used for the implementation of a competitive sourcing study at the Midwest Archaeological Center in Lincoln, Nebraska orthe Southeast Archaeological Center in Tallahassee, Florida.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in the Congressional Record of July 16, 2003, to add a new section to the bill that none of the funds made available by this Act may be used for the implementation of a competitive sourcing study at the Midwest Archaeological Center in Lincoln, Nebraska, or the Southeast Archaeological Center in Florida.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bereuter amendment (A019) Agreed to by recorded vote: 362 - 57 (Roll no. 387).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Bereuter.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bereuter amendment (A019) Agreed to by recorded vote: 362 - 57 (Roll no. 387).
